description: Meat-free mince and mushrooms make a great beef substitute in this rich and cheesy vegetarian lasagna.
name: One Pan Veggie Mince Lasagna Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon half of the mince mixture into a large baking dish, top with lasagne sheets and repeat. Pour over the cheese sauce and bake for 25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
